evidence.text: the Court's consideration of the motion for preliminary injunction will be consolidated with consideration of the merits pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 65(a)(2)

evidence.source_document: Emergency Motion for a Stay Pending Appeal (002)
evidence.text: the Court's consideration of the motion for preliminary injunction will be consolidated with consideration of the merits pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 65(a)(2)
the Court scheduled a hearing on plaintiff’s 26 ... motion for a preliminary injunction on February 26, ... consolidated with the merits
this is particularly true now that the motion for a preliminary injunction has been consolidated with the merits, as defendants requested
